text: There will be no power supply in the following places on February 17 from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. due to shutdown at Perianaikenpalayam sub-station for maintenance work: Perianaikenpalayam, Naickenpalayam, Kovanur, Gudalur Koundampalayam, Jothipuram, Press Colony, No. 4 Veerapandy, Idigarai, Sengalipalayam, Poochiyur, Chinna Thadagam, Nanjundapuram, Mangarai, Annaikatti, Pannimadai, Narasimhanaikenpalayam.
title: Power shutdown
